DOC.detailed_description: This single-centre , double-blind ( neither physician patient know name assign treatment ) , single dose study JNJ-39393406 placebo ( treatment identical appearance JNJ-39393406 contain active drug ) healthy adult volunteer . The study consist eligibility screen examination ( 21 2 day prior dose administration ) , double-blind treatment period , follow-up examination ( minimally 7 maximally 14 day dose administration ) . For volunteer , maximal study duration exceed 6 week . JNJ-39393406 placebo administer single 200-mg dose Day 1 liquid nanosuspension ( formulation use improve solubility drug ) 240 mL ( approximately 8 ounce 1 cup ) noncarbonated water 8:00 AM 10:30 AM standard breakfast consume ( follow fast [ eat food ] least 10 hour ) . Volunteers fast approximately 4 hour take JNJ-3939406 placebo lunch serve .
